00017 class TeamBillboardIcon : public tbe::scene::ParticlesEmiter
00018 {
00019 public:
00020 
00021     TeamBillboardIcon(PlayManager* playManager, Player::Array& teamPlayers)
00022     : tbe::scene::ParticlesEmiter(playManager->parallelscene.particles)
00023     , m_playManager(playManager), m_teamPlayers(teamPlayers)
00024     {
00025         SetBlendEq(ParticlesEmiter::MODULAR);
00026         SetDepthTest(true);
00027     }
00028 
00029     tbe::scene::Node* Clone()
00030     {
00031         return new TeamBillboardIcon(*this);
00032     }
00033 
00034     void SetupBullet(tbe::scene::Particle& p)
00035     {
00036         p.color(1, 1, 1, 0.5);
00037         p.life = 1.0f;
00038     }
00039 
00040     void Process()
00041     {
00042         scene::Particle* particles = BeginParticlesPosProcess();
00043 
00044         unsigned show = 0;
00045         for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_teamPlayers.size(); i++)
00046             if(m_teamPlayers[i] != m_playManager->GetUserPlayer()
00047                && !m_teamPlayers[i]->IsKilled())
00048             {
00049                 particles[show].pos = m_teamPlayers[i]->GetPos() + Vector3f(0, 1, 0);
00050                 show++;
00051             }
00052 
00053         SetDrawNumber(show);
00054 
00055         EndParticlesPosProcess();
00056     }
00057 
00058 protected:
00059     PlayManager* m_playManager;
00060     Player::Array& m_teamPlayers;
00061 };
00062 
00063 PlayTeamManager::PlayTeamManager(AppManager* appManager) : PlayManager(appManager)
00064 {
00065     m_teamBleuIcon = new TeamBillboardIcon(this, blueTeamPlayers);
00066     m_teamBleuIcon->SetTexture(Texture(PARTICLE_BLEUTEAM, true));
00067     m_teamBleuIcon->Build();
00068     manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(m_teamBleuIcon);
00069 
00070     m_teamRedIcon = new TeamBillboardIcon(this, redTeamPlayers);
00071     m_teamRedIcon->SetTexture(Texture(PARTICLE_REDTEAM, true));
00072     m_teamRedIcon->Build();
00073     manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(m_teamRedIcon);
00074 }

00076 PlayTeamManager::~PlayTeamManager()
00077 {
00078 }
00079 
00080 class TeamModeCheckPlayers : public Player::CheckMe
00081 {
00082 public:
00083 
00084     TeamModeCheckPlayers(PlayTeamManager* playManager)
00085     {
00086         m_playManager = playManager;
00087     }
00088 
00089     virtual bool OnTakeDammage(Player* player, Bullet* ammo)
00090     {
00091         return (m_playManager->IsInBleuTeam(player)
00092                 != m_playManager->IsInBleuTeam(ammo->GetWeapon()->GetShooter())
00093                 && m_playManager->IsInRedTeam(player)
00094                 != m_playManager->IsInRedTeam(ammo->GetWeapon()->GetShooter()));
00095     }
00096 
00097 private:
00098     PlayTeamManager* m_playManager;
00099 };

00101 void PlayTeamManager::ModSetupUser(Player* userPlayer)
00102 {
00103     m_userBleuTeam = tools::rand(0, 2);
00104 
00105     if(m_userBleuTeam)
00106         blueTeamPlayers.push_back(userPlayer);
00107     else
00108         redTeamPlayers.push_back(userPlayer);
00109 }
00110 
00111 void PlayTeamManager::ModSetupAi(Player* player)
00112 {
00113     using namespace scene;
00114 
00115     player->AttachController(new TeamModeAi(this));
00116     player->AddCheckPoint(new TeamModeCheckPlayers(this));
00117 
00118     if(redTeamPlayers.size() > blueTeamPlayers.size())
00119     {
00120         blueTeamPlayers.push_back(player);
00121         m_teamBleuIcon->SetNumber(blueTeamPlayers.size());
00122         m_teamBleuIcon->Build();
00123     }
00124     else
00125     {
00126         redTeamPlayers.push_back(player);
00127         m_teamRedIcon->SetNumber(redTeamPlayers.size());
00128         m_teamRedIcon->Build();
00129     }
00130 
00131 }

00133 void PlayTeamManager::ModUpdateStateText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00134 {
00135     using namespace gui;
00136 
00137     ss << "Score : " << m_userPlayer->GetScore() << " Point(s)" << endl;
00138 
00139     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00140         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.curChrono << "/" << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00141     else
00142         ss << "Temps : Infinie" << endl;
00143 
00144     ss << "Equipe : " << (m_userBleuTeam ? "Bleu" : "Rouge") << endl;
00145 
00146     if(m_playSetting.winCond > 0)
00147         ss << "Objectif : " << m_playSetting.winCond << endl;
00148 }

00150 void PlayTeamManager::ModUpdateScoreListText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00151 {
00152     using namespace gui;
00153 
00154     sort(blueTeamPlayers.begin(), blueTeamPlayers.end(), PlayerScoreSortProcess);
00155     sort(redTeamPlayers.begin(), redTeamPlayers.end(), PlayerScoreSortProcess);
00156 
00157     unsigned bleuScore = 0, redScore = 0;
00158 
00159     if(blueTeamPlayers.size())
00160     {
00161         for(unsigned i = 0; i < blueTeamPlayers.size(); i++)
00162             bleuScore += blueTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore();
00163         bleuScore /= blueTeamPlayers.size();
00164     }
00165 
00166     if(redTeamPlayers.size())
00167     {
00168         for(unsigned i = 0; i < redTeamPlayers.size(); i++)
00169             redScore += redTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore();
00170         redScore /= redTeamPlayers.size();
00171     }
00172 
00173     ss << "Carte : " << map.name << endl;
00174     ss << "Type : Team" << endl;
00175 
00176     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00177         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00178     else
00179         ss << "Temps : " << "Infinie" << endl;
00180 
00181     ss << endl;
00182 
00183     ss << "Equipe bleu [" << bleuScore << "]" << endl;
00184     for(unsigned i = 0; i < blueTeamPlayers.size(); i++)
00185         ss << " [" << blueTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore() << "] " << blueTeamPlayers[i]->GetName() << endl;
00186     ss << endl;
00187 
00188     ss << "Equipe rouge [" << redScore << "]" << endl;
00189     for(unsigned i = 0; i < redTeamPlayers.size(); i++)
00190         ss << " [" << redTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore() << "] " << redTeamPlayers[i]->GetName() << endl;
00191     ss << endl;
00192 }

00194 void PlayTeamManager::ModUpdateGameOverText(std::ostringstream& ss)
00195 {
00196     using namespace gui;
00197 
00198     sort(blueTeamPlayers.begin(), blueTeamPlayers.end(), PlayerScoreSortProcess);
00199     sort(redTeamPlayers.begin(), redTeamPlayers.end(), PlayerScoreSortProcess);
00200 
00201     unsigned blueScore = 0, redScore = 0;
00202 
00203     for(unsigned i = 0; i < blueTeamPlayers.size(); i++)
00204         blueScore += blueTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore();
00205     blueScore /= blueTeamPlayers.size();
00206 
00207     for(unsigned i = 0; i < redTeamPlayers.size(); i++)
00208         redScore += redTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore();
00209     redScore /= redTeamPlayers.size();
00210 
00211     if(m_playSetting.winCond > 0)
00212     {
00213         if(m_userPlayer->GetScore() >= (int)m_playSetting.winCond)
00214             ss << "<< VOUS AVEZ GANGEZ !!! >>" << endl;
00215         else
00216             ss << "<< VOUS AVEZ PERDU !!! >>" << endl;
00217 
00218         ss << endl;
00219     }
00220 
00221     ss << "Carte : " << map.name << endl;
00222     ss << "Type : Team" << endl;
00223 
00224     if(m_playTimeManager.startChrono > 0)
00225         ss << "Temps : " << m_playTimeManager.startChrono << endl;
00226     else
00227         ss << "Temps : " << "Infinie" << endl;
00228 
00229     ss << endl;
00230 
00231     ss << "Equipe bleu [" << blueScore << "]" << endl;
00232     for(unsigned i = 0; i < blueTeamPlayers.size(); i++)
00233         ss << " [" << blueTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore() << "] " << blueTeamPlayers[i]->GetName() << endl;
00234     ss << endl;
00235 
00236     ss << "Equipe rouge [" << redScore << "]" << endl;

00238         ss << " [" << redTeamPlayers[i]->GetScore() << "] " << redTeamPlayers[i]->GetName() << endl;

00242 }
00243 
00244 bool PlayTeamManager::IsInBleuTeam(Player* player) const
00245 {
00246     return find(blueTeamPlayers.begin(), blueTeamPlayers.end(), player) != blueTeamPlayers.end();
00247 }
00248 
00249 bool PlayTeamManager::IsInRedTeam(Player* player) const
00250 {
00251     return find(redTeamPlayers.begin(), redTeamPlayers.end(), player) != redTeamPlayers.end();
00252 }
00253 
00254 const Player::Array PlayTeamManager::GetTargetsOf(Player* player) const
00255 {
00256     return IsInRedTeam(player) ? blueTeamPlayers : redTeamPlayers;
00257 }
